SELECT p.liveId AS 'showLiveId', p.`name` AS 'showManName', p.`desc` AS 'showLiveTitle', p.playNum AS 'showLiveNum', p.playNum AS 'showLiveLookNum', p.collect AS 'collectNum', p.thumbup AS 'praiseNum', CASE a.isPay WHEN 1 THEN '是' WHEN 2 THEN '否' END AS 'isPay', CASE WHEN LENGTH(o.parent_ids) >= 11 THEN (SELECT name FROM sys_office WHERE id = SUBSTRING(o.parent_ids FROM 5 FOR 7)) ELSE '' END AS 'stairOne', CASE WHEN LENGTH(o.parent_ids) >= 45 THEN (SELECT name FROM sys_office WHERE id = SUBSTRING(o.parent_ids FROM 13 FOR 32)) ELSE '' END AS 'stairTwo', CASE WHEN LENGTH(o.parent_ids) >= 79 THEN (SELECT name FROM sys_office WHERE id = SUBSTRING(o.parent_ids FROM 46 FOR 32)) ELSE '' END AS 'stairThree', CASE WHEN LENGTH(o.parent_ids) >= 111 THEN (SELECT name FROM sys_office WHERE id = SUBSTRING(o.parent_ids FROM 79 FOR 32)) ELSE '' END AS 'stairFour', CASE WHEN LENGTH(o.parent_ids) = 111 THEN o.name ELSE '' END AS 'stairFive', p.bengtime AS 'showLivebegtime', p.endtime AS 'showLiveendtime', d.label AS 'job', GROUP_CONCAT(ro.name) AS 'role', CASE WHEN LENGTH(c.parent_ids) > 1 THEN (SELECT `name` FROM train_live_category WHERE id = SUBSTRING(c.parent_ids FROM 3 FOR 32)) WHEN LENGTH(c.parent_ids) = 1 THEN c.`name`
END AS 'showLiveOne', CASE WHEN LENGTH(c.parent_ids) > 34 THEN (SELECT `name` FROM train_live_category WHERE id = SUBSTRING(c.parent_ids FROM 36 FOR 32)) WHEN LENGTH(c.parent_ids) = 34 THEN c.`name` END AS 'showLiveTwo', CASE WHEN LENGTH(c.parent_ids) = 67 THEN c.`name` END AS 'showLiveThree' FROM train_live_playback p LEFT JOIN train_live_audit a ON a.id = p.auditId LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = p.userId LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.user_id = p.userId LEFT JOIN sys_role ro ON ro.id = sur.role_id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_dict d ON d.`value`=u.user_type AND d.type='sys_user_type' LEFT JOIN train_live_category c ON c.id = a.category_id LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office o ON u.office_id = o.id WHERE 1 = 1
AND DATE_FORMAT(p.bengtime,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{begtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(p.bengtime,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY p.id,d.label,c.parent_ids,c.name
SELECT id AS 'showId', `name` AS 'showLiveOne' FROM train_live_category WHERE type = 1
SELECT id AS 'showId', NAME AS 'showLiveTwo' FROM train_live_category WHERE parent_id = #{showId}
